editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

msContents.summary: F-46r: Acts of Krǝstos Śämra, Gädlä Krǝstos Śämra, ገድለ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ ሠምራ፡, arranged for the months of the year: Mäskäräm (5v), Ṭəqəmt (9r), Ḫədar (13r), Taḫśaś (15r), Ṭərr (17v), Yäkkatit (20r), Mäggabit (22r), Miyazya (23v), Gənbot (25r), Säne (28r), Ḥamle (30r), Näḥase (33r). F-35v: Biography. F-43r: Thirteen Miracles. F-46r; Image of Krestos Samra, Mälǝkǝ’a Kǝrǝstos Śämra. Enrico Cerulli, Atti Di Krestos Samrā, CSCO 63/64, SA 33/34 (Louvain: Peeters, 1956); Dennis Nosnitsin, “Krәstos Śämra,” EA 3:443–45. mentions owners, ገብረ መድኅን and ወለተ ዮሐንስ. : record: colophon: the book was owned by ወይዘሮ ብሪ ብሥራት, who gave it to the church of Saint Mary Sheguala. The members (living and departed) are listed. The scribe is deacon ገማ ጽዮን. Written in the year 1996 EC. F. ii v(erso) has a printed, full color illumination of the saint, surrounded by Chirst (above) and angels, and saints. Sheguala Maryam
